data.lyric:
[ti:Solar Power]
[ar:Lorde]
[al:Solar Power]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Solar Power - Lorde (洛德)
[00:00.29]Lyrics by：Jack Antonoff/Ella Yelich O'Connor
[00:00.59]Composed by：Jack Antonoff/Ella Yelich O'Connor
[00:00.89]I hate the winter
[00:02.47]
[00:03.46]Can't stand the cold
[00:05.52]I tend to cancel all the plans
[00:08.79]So sorry I can't make it
[00:10.44]
[00:11.83]But when the heat comes
[00:13.48]
[00:14.26]Something takes a hold
[00:16.27]Can I kick it
[00:18.17]Yeah I can
[00:20.26]
[00:21.68]My cheeks in high colour overripe peaches
[00:24.86]No shirt no shoes only my features
[00:27.40]My boy behind me he's taking pictures
[00:30.93]
[00:32.97]Lead the boys and girls onto the beaches
[00:35.99]Come one come all I'll tell you my secrets
[00:38.30]I'm kinda like a prettier Jesus
[00:41.33]
[00:44.65]Forget all of the tears that you've cried
[00:48.16]It's over over over over
[00:55.11]It's a new state of mind
[00:57.66]Are you coming my baby
[01:00.80]
[01:03.81]Acid green aquamarine
[01:07.66]
[01:08.24]The girls are dancing in the sand
[01:12.05]
[01:13.24]And I throw my cellular device in the water
[01:18.69]Can you reach me
[01:20.06]
[01:20.57]No you can't
[01:23.32]
[01:24.52]My cheeks in high colour overripe peaches
[01:27.44]No shirt no shoes only my features
[01:30.24]My boy behind me he's taking pictures
[01:32.96]He's taking pictures
[01:34.88]
[01:35.60]Lead the boys and girls onto the beaches
[01:38.51]Come one come all I'll tell you my secrets
[01:40.98]I'm kinda like a prettier Jesus
[01:43.84]
[01:47.49]Turn it on in a new kind of bright
[01:50.94]It's solar solar solar solar
[01:58.66]Come on and let the bliss begin
[02:01.39]
[02:02.99]Blink three times when you feel it kickin' in
[02:05.35]That solar power
[02:15.62]
[02:16.63]Solar power
[02:26.41]
[02:27.56]Solar power
[02:37.23]
[02:38.44]Solar power
[02:48.24]
[02:49.41]Solar power
[02:59.13]
[03:00.29]Solar power
data.trans:
[ti:Solar Power]
[ar:Lorde]
[al:Solar Power]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.29]//
[00:00.59]//
[00:00.89]我讨厌冬天  
[00:02.47]
[00:03.46]无法忍受刺骨的寒冷 
[00:05.52]我想要取消所有计划
[00:08.79]非常抱歉 我无法做到
[00:10.44]
[00:11.83]但是当热浪来袭时   
[00:13.48]
[00:14.26]带给我被人掌控的感觉
[00:16.27]我能否摆脱这一切
[00:18.17]我可以做到
[00:20.26]
[00:21.68]我的脸颊绯红 就像是熟透了的蜜桃
[00:24.86]不着寸缕 未穿鞋子 只是有我独特的魅力
[00:27.40]我的男孩在我身后 他拍着照片
[00:30.93]
[00:32.97]带领孩子们来到海滩上
[00:35.99]来吧 所有人都过来 我会告诉你们我的秘密  
[00:38.30]我就像是更加漂亮的耶稣  
[00:41.33]
[00:44.65] 将你曾经流下的眼泪忘得一干二净
[00:48.16]一切都已结束 落下帷幕
[00:55.11]这是焕然一新的心境
[00:57.66]你是否愿意来到我身边 我的宝贝
[01:00.80]
[01:03.81]浅绿与湛蓝交相辉映  
[01:07.66]
[01:08.24]女孩们在沙滩上翩翩起舞 
[01:12.05]
[01:13.24]我将我的手机扔进水中
[01:18.69]你能否找到我的下落
[01:20.06]
[01:20.57]你找不到
[01:23.32]
[01:24.52]我的脸颊绯红 就像是熟透了的蜜桃
[01:27.44]不着寸缕 未穿鞋子 只是有我独特的魅力
[01:30.24]我的男孩在我身后 他拍着照片
[01:32.96]他拍着照片
[01:34.88]
[01:35.60]带领孩子们来到海滩上 
[01:38.51]来吧 所有人都过来 我会告诉你们我的秘密
[01:40.98]我就像是更加漂亮的耶稣  
[01:43.84]
[01:47.49]置身于崭新的光明中 变得热血沸腾
[01:50.94]这是灿烂的阳光 灿烂的阳光
[01:58.66]来吧 让幸福降临人间
[02:01.39]
[02:02.99]当你感觉惬意自在时 请眨三次眼睛
[02:05.35]这是阳光的力量
[02:15.62]
[02:16.63]阳光的力量
[02:26.41]
[02:27.56]阳光的力量
[02:37.23]
[02:38.44]阳光的力量
[02:48.24]
[02:49.41]阳光的力量
[02:59.13]
[03:00.29]阳光的力量
